title: Is there a way to pick my entire phone or text number? - Quora

response.answer_text: Generally, not the entire one. The operator will only be able to offer you a number that: Is in the range they have. They generally buy a big block of numbers at a time.Is not already assigned to someoneHas not been assigned to someone else very recently.Some companies will give you a choice of ten or so, if you ask. Some will also have ‘special’ numbers, like ones with repeated digits available if you ask. Many will charge for this.
